title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.6 - Exercise of preferential right or release
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.6 - Exercise of preferential right or release

State Regulations

Upon receipt of notification that the Department of

Transportation and/or other State or local governmental agency or
transportation authority intends to exercise the preferential right of
acquisition, the railroad company may, by certified letter addressed to the

Director, Real Estate Division, New York State Department of Transportation, Building 5, State Campus, Albany, New York 12232, with copy to the authorized
agency or transportation authority, if any, demand that the preferential right
of acquisition be properly exercised within 120 days, or released through the

New York State Department of Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
973.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
